response.overview: Join Serenity as she takes viewers on a voyage into the past, where sex was a customary form of socialization in an empire that believed in sexual freedom. Let Serenity be your guide into the Roman orgy, an open forum of sensuality, where Roman citizens could explore every sexual fantasy with whomever they desired. Full of scorching three ways, four ways, five-ways and more, this Adam Film World Editor's Choice co-stars Alex Sanders, Ian Daniels, Steve Hatcher, Jake Williams, Randy Spears, Kylie Ireland, Christi Lake, Dee, Chris Cannon, Lezley Zen, Nikita Denise, Kristal Summers, Zana, and Cheryl Dynasty.
response.title: Serenity's Roman Orgy
